name: 黃銘智
objective: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，以及相關理論之驗證，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
schedule:
1.Solid Geomtry and CAD
2.Introduction to Pro/Engineer system
3.Constraints and Geometry
4.Feature-based modeling techniques.
5.Model setupand display
6.Advanced modeling skills
7.Make a manufacturable object
8.design change and modify
9.Assembly and Explode Mode
9.The duplication of design feature: Copy and Pattern
10.Surface modeling process
11.Surface modeling skills and application
12.Surface quality and analysis
13.Top-down design process
14.Project practice
